A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Spoiler Free

This was one of the most rock-dumb movies that I have ever seen.

Every individual character decision either was senseless or became senseless by the next act.

The obnoxious public narrative that this is a daring departure for the franchise and if you didn't like it you are too married to the past is an embarrassing smokescreen to deflect criticism of the most jarring and hypocritical decisions.

SW:TLJ manages the herculean task of squandering any good will of the new saga's references to the past as well as any of the meager interesting relationships and dynamics of The Force Awakens in one bloated over-long shaggy film.

The next generation of Star Wars fans and creators deserve better than this.
